name: BMW X1
description: The price of BMW X1, a 5 seater SUV, ranges from Rs. 49.50  - 52.50 Lakh. It is available in 2 variants, with engine options ranging from 1499 to 1995 cc and a choice of 1 transmission: Automatic. X1 has an NCAP rating of 5 stars and comes with 6 airbags. BMW X1 has a ground clearance of 183 mm  and is available in 6 colours. Users have reported a mileage of 16.35 to 20.37 kmpl for X1.

variants.variant_name: X1 sDrive18i M Sport 1499 cc, Petrol, Automatic (DCT), 16.35 kmpl, 134 bhp
X1 sDrive18d M Sport 1995 cc, Diesel, Automatic (DCT), 20.37 kmpl, 148 bhp
